title: What Is Left
description: A ship that runs on the memories of one of its occupants malfunctions and collapses in on itself in the dead of space. Alive but trapped inside the reservoir of the ship's memories, an engineer who survives the wreckage finds herself alone and stranded in a patchwork dream of someone else's life.36pp. Full-colour.http://shortbox.bigcartel.com/product...
author: Rosemary Valero-O'Connell
